tool_description: API that gathers world news relating to COVID-19 by scraping HTML data on articles
name: Corona Virus World News
title: Corona Virus World News

api_list.name: Specific
api_list.description: Focus on a particular site's COVID-related articles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://corona-virus-world-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/latimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corona-virus-world-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://corona-virus-world-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "corona-virus-world-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: News
api_list.description: Pools all of the related articles that were scraped from certain news sites
